posts.title: A brief introduction of steemians in Sichuan (Part 1)
posts.text: Hi, steemit friends!ï’™Today, I want to introduce some of the steemians that I know in Sichuan. I am totally inspired by @htliao, who wrote A brief introduction of the great authors from Hong Kong(Part 1). Recently, I have recommended this platform to my friends. They became so interested in it and applied for their own accounts. Sometimes, we exchange our ideas or opinions about steemit through Wechat, support and encourage each other. The Aim of Our GroupWe are the energetic, optimistic and active ones who like to share life with others. What we want to do is to introduce delicious food in Sichuan, making people know more about our culture, like Bian Lian. And bring some characteristic topics to this big community. Of course, we will stick to original and high quality content, which I think will inject vigor into this big steemit family. Introduction of the Steemians in SichuanNow I am going to introduce them and their post series one by one. If you are interested, feel free to follow them. 1. @cnfund There is no doubt that @cnfund is such a kind man whoâ€™ve guided us to know more about this platform. There were times when I had to turn to him for help and he was always patient to solve my problems and confusion. Perhaps some of you have known him. He insists on writing novels on steemit and up to now, heâ€™s finished about 190 chapters. Amazingï¼His post series include: Foods in My Eyes ã€AFTER CREATIONã€‘(The novel directory 1)(Chinese Original Fantasy Novel) ã€AFTER CREATIONã€‘(Chapter 180)(Chinese Original Fantasy Novel) 2. @lymichale@lymichale is a gentle and quiet girl. Weâ€™ve known each other since we were in kindergarten. Itâ€™s so lucky that now we work in the same city and we are neighbors. She has been here for about one month. She likes to share her daily life with us, especially as a foodie, she shares some traditional local food with us. In the following days, some travel notes can be found in her articles. Her post series include: The day of wine and meat! Cheers! Foods in Sichuan and Chongqing #1â€”Noodles Delicious foods in hometown Â Â Â Â Â To know more, you can read herÂ self-introduction. 3. @acactus1013@acatus1013 is a teacher working in a senior high school and we once worked in the same office. As I know, she enjoys travelling to different places, reading and playing Mahjong in her spare time. She is an optimistic and enthusiastic girl. Several days before, sheâ€™s shared something about our Mahjong, which can be considered as a brief introduction of part of our culture. Her post series include: A Journey With Romantic Themes My Reading Notes About A Brief History of Humankind Letâ€™s go to the seaside! posts.text: Hi, steemit friends!ï’™Welcome to my post. Last week, I introduced part of the steemians that I know in Sichuan, which has received such amazing encouragement and support! I really appreciate it. Through my previous post, you may have known some of our members, such @cnfund, @lymichale and @acactus1013. With time passing, an increasing number of people join us in sharing their thoughts or feelings on this steemit platform. Now, here is some detailed information for you to know other members better. If you are interested, feel free to follow them. 1. @mrpointp@mrpointp is my boyfriend who is very easygoing and kind. Sometimes, he is a funny guy. It has been nearly three months since he came here. During the time, he likes watching movies, working out and writing novels, which can be seen from his posts. Sometimes, he shares his daily life with us. Also, he is a foodie, accompanying me to enjoy various delicious food. After he began his trip here, he was always recommending this platform to me, so Iâ€™m here now. He has written an original novel called Never Say Goodbye for about 29 chapters, which is to be continued. Besides, his daily bodybuilding has been recorded for about 33 chapters, which impress me most. Itâ€™s amazing! posts.text: Hi, steemit friends!ï’™Iâ€™m so delighted to take part in this Hallosteem Photography Contest held by @aaronli. The following are my entries for it. If you have an interest in this contest, you can click here to know more. å¾ˆå¼€å¿ƒèƒ½å¤Ÿå‚åŠ ç”± @aaronliä¸¾åŠçš„Steemitç¤¾åŒºä¸‡åœ£èŠ‚Hallosteemæ‘„å½±å¤§èµ›ï¼Œä»¥ä¸‹æ˜¯æˆ‘çš„å‚èµ›ä½œå“ã€‚å¦‚æœå¤§å®¶å¯¹è¿™ä¸ªæ¯”èµ›æ„Ÿå…´è¶£çš„è¯ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ç‚¹å‡»è¿™é‡Œäº†è§£æ›´å¤šã€‚ Entry 1 Entry 2 Entry 3 Entry 4 Entry 5 Camera/ç›¸æœºï“·ï¼šOPPO R11 Several days before , I have noticed that @nicolemoker, @krischy and @aaronli were holding some contests about Hallosteem. posts.text: Hi, steemit friends!ï’™For our students, the so-called boring life in high school really needs some embellishments, such as winter vacation and summer vacation. Generally, these holidays are always far out of reach and gone too soon for the students. But if they can have a day or half a day off, they will feel satisfied and excited. These two days, our school is holding an annual sports meeting, which I think is a time for relaxation. Now letâ€™s take a look! The Opening CeremonyWhat impressed me most was its opening ceremony. From the quality of the program to the design of costumes, I think it is grander and more brilliant than any other one in previous years. Accompanied by dances, it has been announced beginning. In our senior high, the first important thing in the sports meeting is the fashion parade by classes. They need to parade along the playground to show the image of their classes, with positive slogans shouting all the way. Whether the head teacher or the students in class are very concerned about the quality of their team. So two or three weeks before the sports meeting, the classes began to prepare a variety of things, including clothes and slogans. The parade is also a highlight, where students are in different costumes. From here, we can find their creative imagination. Itâ€™s said that all the costumes are bought from Taobao. Team Events for TeachersUsually, team evens for teachers are arranged first, but I rarely participate in these games, especially running. Dribbling the ball is quite interesting, and participants need to dribble the ball for a distance of 50 meters. We wonâ€™t consume much strength and it takes little time. I find that since I worked, I have never played basketball for a long time or done other sports. All the teachers in this event have tried their best to run. However, senior three students only participate in the half-day sports meeting, and then go back to class. Our school has always had strict requirements for senior three. After all, it wonâ€™t take a year before they take the college entrance examination, and they need to focus on that. The sports meeting seem less important, but in fact, it is of great help to our students. Sports awareness is like moral education, which need to be cultivated from an early age, because it will benefit studentsâ€™ psychological and physical health.Life lies in movement. posts.text: Hi, steemit friends!ï’™My impression of Thai film has been immersed in the influence of Tony Jaa. In my memory, Thailand favors making films about gangsters and martial arts, but this film named Bad Genius really opened my eyes. Picture from weibo.cn A talented girl Xiaolin, from an ordinary family, entered a local aristocratic school under the guidance of his father, where she met the wealthy Grace and rich second-generation Pat. In an exam, Xiaolin first risked helping Grace by exchanging her shoe with Grace, for the shoe contained the right answer, which impressed me a lot. Later, Pat, the boyfriend of Grace and several other students also wanted to be helped by Xiaolin by paying her money. Because of its huge profits, Xiaolin agreed. At this point, the film reached the first climax. Xiao Lin invented the cheating way of using the figures on the piano to create different gestures that stand for A, B, C and D separately. From the beginning to the end, I did not realize her fingering, but I really admired the heroine. However, not everything went smoothly To prevent students cheating in the exam, this school had prepared two sets of papers. When taking the exam, each students would given different papers. Thus, this leaded to failure of the original arrangements for cheating. Here came the second climax of the film. The changed way of cheating had been succeeded, but another genius boy Benjamin reported them to the headmaster, which made Xiao Linâ€™s scholarship removed and his father know her cheating behavior for making money. And the last climax in this film is the highlight of the whole story. Xiaolin and Benjamin together with Grace and Pat planned to cheat in another exam STIC, an international exam for studying abroad. Well, I will not reveal too much. Anyway, itâ€™s really very exciting. The film is something like a spy movie, especially when examiner was chasing Xiaolin in the subway station, creating a tense atmosphere. Iâ€™ve no idea whether it is for the film or the education in Thailand is like this. I feel senior high students in China are not particularly anxious about failing in the exam. I think this film has its instructive meaning, that is, cheating can make you succeed temporarily but you can not rely on others forever. In addition, I personally really like the actors in this film. Although very young, they are so professional and has acted out the characters so vividly. That day, when @mrpointp and I got to the cinema, the audiences below were only two of us, which was just like we had booked the whole theater, lolâ€¦ In short, the film is worth seeing. posts.text: Hi, steemit friends!ï’™Here is my entry for Food Photography Contest held by @juliank. If you have an interest, you can click here to know more. posts.text: Hi, steemit friends!Since the two-child policy was carried out, a great number of people have prepared to have a second child. Many of my female colleagues have become a member of them, causing me an unexpected trouble. Reading here, you may feel surprised. When one thing happens, it will inevitably affect its associated things. When one asks for maternity leave, I will be the one who take the task of teaching. Picture from pixabay.com Torturous teaching workLast week, the news that one of my female colleagues asked for maternity leave got around. In fact, we donâ€™t like to gossip, but this news means that someone will take the teaching job for her. In 2015, I did the same job and I was a newcomer. There is no doubt that I canâ€™t refuse. I still remember that I was teaching my first students, which meant I had to teach three classes for 2 months. So busy was I that I had no time to rest and relax. Whatâ€™s worse, students in that class were very naughty. I felt stressed and worn out, as a result, I was ill. Six months ago, our headmaster asked me to do the same job, that is to take the task of teaching for another colleague who had just asked for maternity leave. I needed to teach for 3 months, which was terrible. Somehow, my colleague extended her holiday and I had to work for two more months. On average, I had four periods each day. I was engaged in preparing the teaching contents every day. It was a nightmare for me. Learn to say noThis time, itâ€™s likely that I will be one of the candidates who take this task, but I have been determined to refuse whatever happens. As expected, I am asked to finish this task. However, after I told my thoughts to the headmaster, he should agree. Itâ€™s communication that really counts. Like this, I think itâ€™s better to be in school. But as an employee of an enterprise, the leaderâ€™s order is more important than anything, for it will affect the leaderâ€™s impression of you. If you can complete the task, you will agree. posts.title: Students' Pressure on Campus ğŸ“ å­¦ç”Ÿçš„æ ¡å›­å¼å‹åŠ›
posts.text: Hi, steemit friends!ï’™As we all know, students at each stage have their own unique label. For example, a college studentâ€™s label is to enjoy the campus life and get a job, while a high school one is linked to this word â€œbitterâ€. This bitterness and the bitter experience experienced in society belong to different concepts that are usually incomparable. I always hear the elderly friends sigh that when they were young, they met tough conditions while now our teenagers are living a better life. Logically speaking, it is right now that teenagers should be more content and delighted. They are thought to be more mature than we were in the past, however, it is not the truth. Picture from pixabay.com Here are two things that I witnessed and they both happened in my class. The 1st one It is ridiculous to say that the conflict resulted from a â€œfart.â€ One day, students in my class were doing morning reading when a girl inadvertently broke wind. (In fact, I personally think that this act is embarrassing, but it is common and not worth discussing.) Thus it caused some students in the class whispered and began to talk about and even laughed at the girl. Something happened like a volcano that had been accumulating for many years. Suddenly, the girl stood up in class and said to the talkers behind her,â€Itâ€™s just me!â€ Then she rushed out of the classroom. To comfort her, I followed and caught up with her. At this time, the girl burst into tears. After she was emotionally stable, I chatted with her, and from her words I learned that she did this not just because of the gossips from her classmates but because faced with the pressure in the coming entrance examination, she can not bear this matter. I am so sad, for she is just a teenager who should have lived in a simple and happy environment, but the pressure on her is beyond my imagination. Some come from school, or the family, others may be from surroundings including the classmates and friends around. The 2nd one This is a conflict that has been stopped in time, and I do not know how it would develop if there was no one. Maybe we have experienced the problems about seats during our school days. Sometimes we think our position is too narrow, which makes us to remind the back or front classmate to move his or her desk. This is a very common interpersonal communication. The similar situation happened to a boy and a girl in my class The boy sitting behind used to straighten his legs, perhaps touching the chair of the girl in front of him, and she felt she had narrow space. From the initial complaints to the dispute, the boy suddenly stood up, threw books to the girl and even prepared to lift up their chairs. I went forward to stop the boy. I do not know whether the boy will really do that. If so, he will make himself regretful in the future. I am neither an educator nor a psychologist. I can not specifically analyze what problems exist among students. I only know that studentsâ€™ pressure is on the increase because of high demands on academic qualifications in our society. Now there are many postgraduates and college students can be seen everywhere. The college entrance examination is cruel, and always eliminates some people. I have seen some of them who tried hard but never achieved their goals. Especially after chatting with that girl, I find that we should pay more attention to studentsâ€™ psychological problems than to impart knowledge to help students improve their grades. We admire Confucius as the Master, so we should integrate the essence into our present education. The so-called â€œeducationâ€ is â€œteaching knowledge and educating people!â€ In addition to focusing on the development of childrenâ€™s IQ and the accumulation of knowledge, but also we should transfer some educational resources to improving quality education and emotional intelligence. (PS: Above are my personal thoughts.) posts.title: Wandering in Phuket æ¼«æ¸¸æ™®å‰å²› (Chapter 2)
posts.text: Every morning we woke up in Phuket, we always felt excited, so we decided to explore this place. We ate breakfast on the balcony of our room. At this time, several people were swimming in the pool. The sea that had receded yesterday evening drifted over the beach with the arrival of the sun. I have to say that this is a very pleasant dining environment. After breakfast, we also changed the swimsuit to enjoy in the swimming pool. At that moment, swimming in the pool was particularly comfortable, for the sun was not so hot and the water temperature was just right. I really realized that the weather in Phuket was unpredictable.A sudden rain brought each of us in the pool back to the room. We were also ready to go to lively Patong. Day 2 No.6 Restaurant â†’ Swensenâ€™s â†’ Letâ€™s Relax â†’ Phuket Simon Cabaret â†’ Malin Plaza No.6 Restaurant and Swensenâ€™sToday our first stop is to visit the No. 6 restaurant with the highest evaluation on the Internet. This restaurant has several branches in here. Itâ€™s said that the food here is of great quality. With noon approaching, there were lots of people lining up outside, most of whom were Chinese. It seemed that this restaurant had been very successful in domestic online market,lolâ€¦ To be honest, this restaurant is still worth queuing for visitors. I will introduce the specific content in a few days. After lunch, of course, itâ€™s time for desserts in a famous store in Thailand named Swensenâ€™s. Letâ€™s Relax SpaThere was no such thing as massage on our schedule that day, but because of the bad weather, we decided to enjoy Thai-style massage in Letâ€™s Relax Phuket 2nd Street. It took ten minutes from Jungceylon. If you pay a visit to Thailand, you do experience such kind of massage, a major feature of Thailand. Thai-style massage pays special attention to stretching, but may not be so exaggerating in film or television dramas. Phuket Simon CabaretWe got wet on the way to Phuket Simon Cabaret, so it is advised that youâ€™d better not go for a walk in Phuket during its rainy season, unless the distance is really short. Even if you bring an umbrella, it is difficult to avoid getting wet. Even so, it is worthwhile to sit in the front row enjoying this performance, leaving me a deep impression. It was the first time we had seen ladyboys. Personally thinking, Phuket Simon Cabaret is highly recommended. If so, booking tickets online is needed, for it includes pick-up service. If you buy the tickets on the spot, it would be much more expensive. Malin PlazaJust a few hundred meters from the Simon Cabaret there is a popular market named Malin Plaza, a place that cannot be missed for foodies. The fried yoghurt and noodles in this market are super delicious. On my second day in Phuket, â€œto experience the characteristics of Thai culture and cuisine â€œ can be used to describe it. The most favorite for me is massage, because it is so comfortable that you are likely to fall asleep. When we went back to the hotel, we planned the next dayâ€™s trip, hoping Phuket could bring us more surprises. Good night. I think not all people can know photoshop well, letting alone using it well, but this app can be used by anyone. If you have an interest, here we go. Bazaart is an award winning photo collage app, which allows you to create masterpieces on the go, and seamlessly work with Adobe Creative Cloud. Add any logo you want to the photoHere are some screenshots for you. First you need to prepare a logo which will be added to your photo. ATTENTION: You must use the logo with pure background. White background is the best. Then use scissors to cut and then choose the function â€œeraseâ€. Finally click â€œautoâ€ and you will get what you want. Besides, you can adjust the size of the logo to satisfy your need. But if you want to keep the high-definition image, you have to pay for it. Offer various typefaces and change the size of the photo fit for social mediaAs you can see from the picture below, you can choose a specific typeface for you, reflecting your personal style. posts.text: The next day two rounds of rains made us got wet, directly causing mrpointp to have a fever on the 3rd day. so I think it can be considered our transitional period. He lay in bed for most of the day. After cleaning and tidying up all the clothes, I began to watch theTVB Opera named ShÄ“n GÅng JÃ¬. Although we did not go out, I had a sense of ease. Transit costs are high and it also wastes enegry to travel by ourselves. So we planned to find a one-day tour on the fourth and fifth days. At noon, a Chinese tour guide took a VAN to the hotel to pick us up and began a new day. Day 3-4 Prom Thep Cape â†’ Karon View Point â†’ Wat Cha-long â†’ King Power Duty Free Gorgeous Prom Thep CapeItâ€™s said that there is a sunset called the sunset of Prom Thep Cape, but in our eyes, it is mysterious and full of vicissitudes. Because of the bad weather, what we saw was dark clouds, but it didnâ€™t affect my appreciation for it. At this time, there was a different kind of beauty. I like the strong winds and green seawater. Afterwards, we went to the Karon View Point. Since it rained, we could see nothing but frog. Holy Wat Cha-LongAfter the rain, this temple seemed to be quiet, which gave us a momentary sense of calmness. The ground was covered with white frangipani flowers and it perfectly matched the rain that had just fallen. .jpg) .jpg) According to the Thai customs, no one can be allowed to take pictures inside the temple and we didnâ€™t dress appropriately. Therefore, we just took some photos outside. It is worth mentioning that when in Rome, do as the Romans do. Crowded King Power Duty FreeThe last stop of this one-day trip is King Power Duty Free. Compared to the Duty Free Shop in Sanya, this place is full of people, especially Chinese . Here our tour guide first arranged for us to have dinner. The buffet offered was fairly good. Its type and taste catered to most tourists from different countries. For the remaining two hours, we started shopping. I bought some specialties for my friends and family. It has turned out that it is wise to choose a one-day tour in Phuket. We have been to many places this day, which cost us RMB 176. If you go there on your own, it will just be equal to a taxi fare. so I suggest you choosing this plan. posts.title: Innisfree Green Cafe
posts.text: Today, Iâ€™d like to share with you a super sweet dessert shop. Located in Taikoo Li, Chengdu, it is attached to Innisfree, a cosmetics company. The desserts there taste so delicious, unbelievable! At first, I was really shocked to hear that there was a dessert shop run by this company. I even worried about whether facial cleanser would be added to desserts,lolâ€¦ Holding tried state of mind, @mrpointp together with I went to this place. Surprisingly, both its desserts and decorations are fresh and transcendent, just as the ad says. Logs and rocks can be seen in the store, allowing customers to feel the natural taste, with soft and elegant music played. Now, itâ€™s time for desserts! ï˜‹ï¹ï® Mousse cake in the shape of cloud I have to say that the creativity of innisfree style is nearly perfect. This cloud-shaped cake is really refreshing, making me want to take a big bite. Inside the cake are mousse and ice cream, separately made from matcha and strawberry. Latte with red velvet I have no interest in coffee, but I have a passion for this red velvet latte. Itâ€™s unique, both in appearance and taste. Mango ice with marshmallows Compared with cloud-shaped cake, this cloud made of marshmallows is more vivid. This one is very suitable in summer. After enjoying the â€œcloudâ€, you can mix the stuff inside, tasting like smoothie. Sparkling Water with Green Grape If you eat several kinds of desserts at a time, you may feel it too sweet. At this time, sparkling water is needed. Afterwards, I will always order a cup of bubble water or soda every time I eat desserts. Cake pop Iâ€™ve no idea whether you have heard of a lollipop made of cake before. The upper layer is wrapped in nuts. The stuff inside is soft, tasting a little bit sweet. Generally speaking, the whole desserts there are too sweet. If you donâ€™t like sweets, eat less. In addition to its various flavors, its environment is also worthy of being experienced. posts.title: Natural Restaurant
posts.text: Today I will continue to introduce a restaurant in Phuket Town, which is called Natural Restaurant. Frankly speaking, the highlight of this restaurant is not the taste of the dishes, but its environment. The environment and atmosphere there is my favorite among the restaurants that I have visited these days. If you like taking pictures, do come to this three-storeyed restaurant, which is gorgeous and natural. Letâ€™s take a look at its surroundings The small ponding next to our dining table seems particularly nice when it rains. The fish swimming in the old TV set-shaped tank makes me interested. I also want to buy one like this. On the first floor, there is a large dining table with local decorations featured. Is the puppy made of wood carved around the stairway very cute? Surrounded by vibrant green plants, it is like enjoying a big meal in the rainforest. If it is not so hot,dining on the top floor will be quite good. The green plants, the signboards and the sky form a poetic picture. The following are some dishes ordered by usBraised Chicken Wrapped in Pandanus LeavesAt first we thought it was something like Chinese rice dumplings. In fact, itâ€™s made of chicken with curry favor, and it smells nice.Spring RollsSpring rolls are not the same as I imagined. The upper layer is crispy and the inside seems to be made of silk noodles. With the sweet sauce served, itâ€™s really delicious.Deep Fried Stuffed Tofu with Peanut SauceI have ordered fried tofu several times in Phuket. Compared with our Sichuan-tyle tofu, this one is mild tasting.Thai Style Fried Noodles with Fresh ShrimpThai seafood fried noodles are worthy of a try, and when in Phuket, you may as well order such delicious dish.Chicken BiryaniI favor this meal because the taste really agrees with me. With a little curry, it is spicy.Summer DrinksWatermelon juice is simply a good way to avoid the summer heat, which really quenches my thirst. The ice-cold milk tea is also great.Dining in the Natural Restaurant, the most enjoyable is still the environment. If we visit Phuket in winter, we might be able to fully experience this restaurant. We will choose to eat on the top floor, enjoying the sunshine and posts.text: Wangfujing shopping mall in Leshan was opened up around two or three years ago, and the cafe named Chun Coffee has come into being there since then. Leshan, a tourist city, is lacking in such a large dessert store. Since it opened, I thought I could occasionally come for some drinks but in fact I have visited it twice in three years. Compared with the design style of Starbucks, its style makes me more comfortable, and there are much more furnishings and decorations. Now, I will introduce to you this cafe and its delicious food. At the entrance of the shop stands a four-meter-high tree, on which many bird models can be seen. Here is an European-style vintage bookshelf, plant-filled stairs, birds in the golden iron cage, and bare branches. This is the brief information for a certain kind of coffee, but what attracts me most is its creative decorations. Lemon and cucumber soda is free of charge, which can be taken from this table, so there is no need for you to order drinks. There are teddy bears of different colours on each table, for each one stands for a number. The waiter will serve the dish according to the bear (number) you get. Isnâ€™t it special? Now, itâ€™s time for desserts! ï˜‹ï¹ï® Multilayer Cake with Mango With a great flavor, this one looks very delicate. On the upper layer are a blueberry, a piece of mango, fresh ice-cream and a peppermint leaf. But the mango is not fresh, looking like canned mango. Honey Bread Anyone who favors bread can have a try. The bread itself is sweet, and with some honey and jam added, it is much more delicious. Milk tea with marshmallow The taste of milk tea is brilliant, which differs from the milk tea sold in the common tea stores. The tea flavor is more than its sweetness. I like drinks and desserts there, but I prefer its atmosphere and surroundings. With wide space, the whole store is full of natural atmosphere. If my introduction really attracts you, you might as well pay a visit to it. posts.title: ã€Œæ¢åº—ã€A Nice Japanese Restaurant å’Œé£å¯¿å¸åº—
posts.text: These days I have been busy preparing for our wedding, so seldom do I have time to cook a meal at home. This nice Japanese restaurant visited by @mrpointp and me frequently. The delicious food there is of high quality, so I canâ€™t wait to share these dishes with you. Octopus Ball This is one of my favorite snacks, and every time I go to a Japanese restaurant, I always order it. Octopus ball, also known as tokoyaki, originated in Japan and mainly consists of octopus ingredients, octopus burning powder, seaweed and octopus sauce, etc. (Actually, the way to make it varies from restaurant to restaurant). Cucumber Hoso-makiAmong all kinds of sushi, cucumber rolls are easy to make. We can find the ingredients in the market easily, usually seaweed chips and cucumber. There is no such special flavor, but it tastes really refreshing. Super Spicy RamenItâ€™s a kind of famous Japanese ramen. Inside it are seaweed, fungus, egg and beef. The soup is spicy but delicious. If you are not used to spicy food, youâ€™d better not drink the soup.Hand-rolled SalmonI donâ€™t like sashimi, but salmon is OK for me, especially wrapped in seaweed slices. And there is no fishy smell. Usually I add some mustard mixed with soy sauce to this hand roll.California Roll To make California roll, you need to spread the rice on the seaweed slice, and then reverse the seaweed to wrap the ingredients, like crab meat and cucumber. I have tried to make California roll myself before. Compared with the one made by me, this California roll is so delicate.Japanese-style beef with riceThis Japanese-style beef with rice is a favorite of @mrpointp. Please come with me to appreciate the beauty of the Golden Summit! å³¨çœ‰å±±é‡‘é¡¶ä¹Ÿç§°åè—å¯ºï¼Œæ˜¯å³¨çœ‰æ¸¸å±±çš„æœ€ç»ˆç›®çš„åœ°ï¼Œåœ¨é‡‘é¡¶å¯ä»¥è§‚çœ‹å³¨çœ‰å››å¤§å¥‡è§‚â€”â€”æ—¥å‡ºã€äº‘æµ·ã€ä½›å…‰ã€åœ£ç¯ã€‚è·Ÿæˆ‘ä¸€èµ·å»çœ‹çœ‹é‡‘é¡¶çš„ç¾æ™¯å§ï¼ ã€Œæ—…è¡Œã€å³¨çœ‰å±±æ¸¸è®°ï¼ˆä¸Šï¼‰My Trip to Mount Emei After getting out of the cable car, we climbed the stairs for a few more minutes and finally came to the Golden Summit we were longing to see. Looking up at the golden statue of Ten party Samantabhadra Bodhisattva, I felt a sense of reverence, and there were some tourists worshiping reverently. ä¸‹äº†ç¼†è½¦ï¼Œå†çˆ¬å‡ åˆ†é’Ÿçš„æ¥¼æ¢¯ï¼Œç»ˆäºæ¥åˆ°æˆ‘ä»¬å‘å¾€çš„é‡‘é¡¶ï¼ŒçœŸçš„éå¸¸ç¥åœ£å’Œå£®è§‚ã€‚ä»°è§†ç€åæ–¹æ™®è´¤è©è¨çš„é‡‘åƒï¼Œå†…å¿ƒçš„å´‡æ•¬æ„Ÿæ²¹ç„¶è€Œç”Ÿï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥çœ‹è§ä¸€äº›æ¸¸å®¢ç¤¼æ‹œç€ç¥åœ£çš„é‡‘åƒã€‚ Compared with Leidongping, the temperature in the Golden Summit is much lower as if it were early winter. posts.title: ã€CNåŒºç¾é£Ÿå¤§èµ›#2ã€‘å®¶ä¹¡èœä¹‹é’µé’µé¸¡ Local food â€” Bobo Chicken
posts.text: Hi, steemit friends!ï’™ Maybe you have heard of Sichuan-style skewers or Malatang(something like hot pot), but you may not know that they still exist in another form, that is, the â€œBobo Chickenâ€ that originated from Leshan. Bobo chicken, which has existed since the Qing dynasty, is one of the traditional snacks in Chengdu and Leshan. In our dialect, â€œboboâ€ means crock pots. The outside of the crock is beautifully painted with dragon symbols. To make this snack, some spicy condiments are needed to put in the crock. Then some dishes must be specially processed and held up with the bamboo skewers. After the dishes cool down, people put them into the crock. In summer, we always choose this snack, because it tastes good and doesnâ€™t burn the mouth. When speaking of its name, most people may think there is only chicken inside! In fact, the ingredients in the pot are diverse, such as boneless chicken feet, pork bellies, beef, quail eggs, pigskin and duck intestines, etc. The vegetarian dishes include fungus, bamboo shoots and lettuce, etc. I can say that almost all the ingredients we usually like to eat can be made into the pot. In addition to spicy soup, the soup with the taste of the Zanthoxylum schinifolium etzucc is also very popular, and another kind of soup with sesame flavor is suitable for people who do not like spicy food. It is said that the key to the delicious bobo chicken lies in its oil made of Zanthoxylum schinifolium etzucc. The unique scent makes the soup quite delicious, while the pepper oil and chili oil easily lead to excessive internal heat. If you come to Leshan, you will find almost everyone eating this food with this local drink (as you can see from the picture above) on the table. Compared with Sichuan-style skewers(something like hot pot), bobo chicken wonâ€™t make you sweat while eating. In Leshan, you can always find restaurants that offer bobo chicken, but if you want to enjoy the best one, youâ€™d better go to popular food destinations such as Leshan Port and Old Park. As for me, bobo chicken can represent one of the traditional dishes in Leshan. Itâ€™s just like hot pot can represent Sichuan and Chongqing cuisine. It is a symbol of a city. If you have a chance to visit here, do have a try. Finally, I want to say thanks to @abcallen for holding such a great food contest. posts.text: Hi, steemit friends!ï’™ Long time no see! These days Iâ€™ve been busy travelling and now Iâ€™d like to share them one by one. It is said that Qinghai becomes a popular sightseeing place because of a video app named Douyin, but I feel itâ€™s worth it. Iâ€™m a southerner breathing the humid air of Sichuan and feeling the mild sunshine at low altitude. With anxiety and curiosity, we set out. After a night, we finally transferred to Xining via Lanzhou. Cool temperatures, hot sunshine and our dark-skinned driverâ€”everything in front of us made me realize that our travel had begun. As the driver said, the weather in Xining is the hottest of this year. At this time, I was so envious of it, because it is not as hot and humid as Sichuan. Even if there is the sun shining, you will feel cool in the shade. Day 1 Riyue Mountain â†’ Daotang River â†’ Qinghai Lake Riyue Mountain Its rich historical legend is my first impression of Riyue Mountain. Thousands of years ago, Princess Wencheng in Tang Dynasty was sent far from home and married Srongtsen Gampo, and Riyue Mountain was the hometown she missed. It is said that the sun and moon mirror fell into two halves. It separately fell on two mountains, and Riyue Mountain was named after it. This scenic spot is about 3,500 meters above sea level, with an average elevation of 4,000 meters. Stand at a high place, and you will have a good view, which is extremely shocking and amazing. The Sun and Moon pavilion is an octagonal spire-style brick-wood structure with a golden glazed tile roof. The two pavilions are equipped with round and semi-circular bronze mirrors to represent the sun and the moon. Daotang River This river is another place full of legends. The most widely known one is that Princess Wenchengâ€™s tears of homesickness converged this stream flowing westward. With its ethnical features and living flavour, after buying the tickets, we can wear traditional Tibetan costumes and take photos freely. You can see many Marnyi Stone piles when you enter the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau. Inside the pile are scriptures that prevent hatred, drive away disasters, and pray for peace. The stones are often engraved with Buddha images or a common Tibetan slogan. Qinghai Lake Qinghai Lake is the largest saltwater lake in China. With the area of â€‹â€‹more than 4,000 square kilometers, this place is destined to be an extraordinary lake. It is one of the most popular tourist attractions in Qinghai. I have to say that Qinghai Lake is really beautiful and fascinating. With blue sky, the clear lake is surrounded by mountains. This was the first time that I had visited Qinghai, and I saw the vast prairie for the first time. It not only broadened my horizon, but also shocked my soul. There were cattle and sheep horses that were stocked everywhere. They were born with the vast grasslands. Everything there was like a dynamic picture, which made me linger. Staying here for a whole day, it seemed that I had forgotten the prosperity of the noisy city and were eager to integrate into this pure nature. At night, we put up at the B&B near the shore of the Heima River, where we could watch the sunrise the next morning. With satisfaction and expectation, we fell asleep. posts.text: Hi, steemit friends!ï’™ The first day in Qinghai was too tiring, perhaps because of long-term fatigue of travel, or because we couldnâ€™t adapt to this high-altitude area immediately. We went to sleep very early that night. ã€Œæ—…è¡Œã€Wandering in Northwest China æ¼«æ¸¸å¤§è¥¿åŒ— (Chapter 1) Day 2 Heima River â†’ Chaka Salt Lake â†’ Fuicui Lake Heima River The next morning, we were awakened by the owner of the B&B at around 6 to watch the sunrise. The location of this B&B is quite good, which is in the center of the grassland and close to the river. As can be seen from the photo, it is a great place to enjoy the sunrise. This was the first time we had seen the sunrise and witnessed this fantastic moment. We were really shocked by this natural landscape. The rising sun was not glaring. Instead, it touched the entire grassland with its warm light, and drove away coldness. After that, we hurried to leave for Chaka Salt Lake, around 100 kilometers away. It was a new day. We all were looking forward. Looking out of the car window, we could see the mountains and sometimes there were hundreds of sheep grazing on the hillside leisurely. Without herdsmen accompanying them, this place was their paradise. Soon, we arrived at the popular tourist attractionâ€”Chaka Salt Lake. Chaka Salt Lake The Chaka Salt Lake is located between two mountains. The mountains are covered with snow all the year round. The snow-capped mountains are reflected on the surface of the lake, forming a unique natural view of the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau where the water and the sky meet. When we came to the salt area, we saw many salt sculptures. This salt sculpture in the photo is named The Legend Genghis Khan, 50m long, 30m wide and 8m high, using 4,800t salt. The sculpture is spectacular, representing the nobility and aggressiveness of the legend Genghis Khan; with innovative and unique artistic methods, it displays the marvelous spectacle, perfectly integrates the salt and sculpture art. Along the way, we stepped on the road covered with salt crystals as if it were snow. The Chaka Salt Lake was really gorgeous. The endless lake, blue sky and white clouds combined to compose such beautiful scenery. But there were too many tourists, and even to take photos was difficult. It is worth mentioning that there is a lively shopping street in the exit of Chaka Salt Lake Scenic Area. When tourists are tired, they can rest here, eating food or buying special products. Our next stop was to Feicui Lake in Da Qaidam, which was also a salt lake. Compared with the lively Chaka Salt Lake, it was totally different. Fuicui Lake There were fewer tourists visiting here, for this Lake was relatively remote. As for me, it was more beautiful than Chaka Salt Lake. The water in Feicui Lake is very clear, just like the shallow sea water. The most important is that the salt lake is not surrounded by any modern elements, as if we came to an unexploited land. This is completely a magnifcent and mysterious world of nature. That night, we stayed at Da Qaidam and still found a Szechuan Restaurant which offered delicious hometown dishes. Recalling the previous travel to Phuket, I realized that if I coudnâ€™t find any tasty meals during the travel, I wouldnâ€™t have the energy to appreciate the gorgeous scenery. posts.text: Hi, steemit friends!ï’™ We set out from Da Qaidam in the early morning, and it was also a long journey from our next destination. The altitude we were in would drop from more than 3,000 meters to around 1,000 meters. Located in Haixi Zhou of Qinghai Province, this stop is the most gorgeous highway(zuÃ¬ mÄ›i gÅng lÃ¹) sweeping the online world. ã€Œæ—…è¡Œã€Wandering in Northwest China æ¼«æ¸¸å¤§è¥¿åŒ— (Chapter 2) Day 3 The most gorgeous highway â†’ Oil town â†’ 365 Desert base camp The most gorgeous highway Some people like beaches, some like grasslands, and others may like mountains. I also believe that you will be attracted by the vast Gobi Desert. After leaving Da Qaidam, the vegetation coverage became less and less, and flocks of sheep became fewer and fewer. We drove from the grassland to the gobi, and wind turbines and base stations could be seen everywhere all the way. At noon, we arrived and pulled our car over. This straight road is really suitable for taking photos. It is a beautiful and clean road which seems connected to the sky. I preferred the gobi on both sides of the road, barren but full of mystery. I also admired those who insisted on working here. Perhaps they could really understand the unique beauty of this Gobi Desert. Oil town On this vast Gobi Desert, there was an oil town located in Akesai, Gansu Province. I personally think that this is the tourist attraction with lowest cost, for the buildings in the whole town are in ruins, making this place become a film shooting base, such as Chronicles of the Ghostly Tribe, Dragon Blade. Even its maintenance cost can be saved. Maybe what is needed is such desolateness. In order to make visitors feel itâ€™s worth it, there are several jeep cars and some large weapon models placed inside this oil town. What impressed me most was the bus that was at 45-degree angle to the ground. 365 Desert base camp The following was a few hoursâ€™ drive and we went directly to Dunhuang, Gansu Province. The temperature in Gansu was obviously higher than that in Qinghai, but it was quite comfortable compared with the high temperature in Sichuan. posts.text: Hi, steemit friends!ï’™ Since the new semester began, Iâ€™ve been busy with my work. Seldom do I have time to see films in the cinema. It was not until the video platform iQiyi uploaded The Island that I had a chance to enjoy it. Compared with other similar films or TV plays, this is a less bloody film on how to survive on a deserted island. The most terrible part of the whole play is the mass brawl. During the hundreds of days of fighting survival on this island, no one died because of the struggle for interests. It shows this scale is well grasped. At this scale, The Island can still stimulate my reflection. A group of people in different positions work in the same company. One day, a huge wave brought them to an uninhabited island, where all of their positions would be cleared. Thus, the nature of human being was exposed at this time. The film is well mastered in character characterization. People in different positions all exposed their selfish humanities at different moments. For example, the security guard Zhao Tianlong was originally honest, and even didnâ€™t know what the word â€œleague buildingâ€ meant, but he was the first person to break out. People who would flatter the leader also revealed their characters. I have to say that the starring Huang Bo is the highlight of the whole play. The hero Ma Jin(played by Huang Bo) knew that he had won a 60-million-prize in a lottery on the first day of this desert island, and that he was required to cash the winning lottery ticket in 90 days made him crazy. Compared with his life, to own 60 million counted more. Approaching the deadline, Ma Jin almost broke down and cried. Dramatically, at this time, a heavy rain brought countless marine fish to Ma Jin and Xiao Xing (played by Zhang Yixing). Ma Jin said to himself, â€œThis is absolutely a reward for me.â€ On this deserted island, whoever owns food is the King. What this film expresses most is the reality and horrible humanity. Most of the 30 people on this island were mediocre. In times of distress, there was only one thing in their mindâ€”to live on. Without morality and bottom line, if anyone was egged on, they would do whatever they were asked to do. At that moment, I realized that most people in this world are like this, perhaps including you and me, because we are used to disguising ourselves in such a materially rich world. The so-called honest Xiao Xing also became a bad guy. Because of his powerâ€”the ability to control others, he began to become so crazy that later on he destroyed othersâ€™ hope of returning home for the sake of his own interests. Someone thinks that Xiao Xing is actually the gloomy side of Ma Jin, but I think this is everyoneâ€™s gloomy side. Ma Jinâ€™s kindness was more than desire. The ending of the film is almost perfect. Thirty people have returned to their homes, safe and sound. I believe this ending totally caters to the expectations of most audiences. However, from the perspective of the authenticity of the film, there still exist some flaws in it. It reminds me of the movie named Cast Away starring Tom Hanks in 2000, which does better in dealing with details. On this abandoned island, it is hard to find food. The chronically underfed wonâ€™t be gentle and friendly. The most important thing is that in that case there must be some people who get sick. Another American play , Lost, tells of dozens of people struggling to live on a small island. The details are also handled very well. Of course, TV plays and movies are incomparable. To be frank, The Island is a wonderful domestic movie that I have seen in recent years, for its success doesnâ€™t lie in nostalgia. If you have an interest, you may as well see this film. In this barren place, plants and water are symbols of life. ã€Œæ—…è¡Œã€Wandering in Northwest China æ¼«æ¸¸å¤§è¥¿åŒ— (Chapter 4) Staying here for around an hour, I always felt that my mouth dried out. Thus we chose to take the sightseeing car back. In addition, you can experience taking the glider or helicopter here to enjoy the panorama of the whole desert. Of course, this is for-pay service. Itâ€™s time for dinner. As for me, nothing can be compared with delicious food. That afternoon, I had a sound sleep in the hotel and then went to the near local night market, which was really lively here, and almost every restaurant placed tables and chairs outside. Although crowded and noisy, but everything was in order. When you visit northwest China, you canâ€™t miss the skewers here. It is said that the skewers in Dunhuang are slightly inferior to those in Xinjiang, but I still think it is very delicious. If I have a chance, I will definitely go to Xinjiang to experience the traditional skewers in the future. This local drink named Da Yao Jia Bin is really amazing. Looking like beer, it is a kind of drink whose taste is sour and sweet. The iced drink with skewers can be a perfect match. It was very late when we returned to the hotel. The experience of this day was very wonderful, making me pleased. Even before I went to bed, I thought of the dinner we had had. With such satisfcation, we and we went to sleep. posts.text: Hi, steemit friends!ï’™ Colorful Danxia is the last stop of our trip to northwest China in August. Itâ€™s located in Zhangye City, Gansu Province. In the past two years, colorful Danxia has become so famous on the Internet that it cannot be missed. Here Iâ€™d like to share this post about this so-called legendary colorful Danxia from an objective perspective. ã€Œæ—…è¡Œã€Wandering in Northwest China æ¼«æ¸¸å¤§è¥¿åŒ— (Chapter 5) For convenience, the first day we stayed in Linze County, Zhangye City, where we enjoyed the hot pot. The next morning, accompanied by the coolness, we set out. Not in a hurry, we were in high spirits. On the way, we saw the paragliders in the sky and began to get excited. You can always find beautiful sentences in the poems which are used to describe the beauty of Danxia. Danxiaâ€™s unique shape and natural landscape have long been heard of, and it is precisely because most touristsâ€™ psychological expectations are too high that the real Danxia makes them disappointed when getting here. This is definitely a drawback brought by the Internet. Most of the photos shared on the Internet are processed. With good weather, they look very dazzling and attractive. Whatâ€™s more, recommended by netizens, a large number of tourists, including us, flood into this spot. Frankly speaking, I like the Danxia landform, even if the real scenery cannot compare with gorgeous photos shared on the Internet, it still shocks me. The ticket for the Danxia landform is around $11(80 rmb), which consists of entrance ticket and sightseeing ticket.
